--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> With a roar of his engine Beachcomber is off, gracefully jumping of
> rocks and the like. Firedrill's inside reconfigures to fit Redhot, 
and
> then he follows, although a lot slower than he is capable off.

::Redhot::

    Redhot stood on his knees in the back of Firedrill, eagerly 
surveying his surroundings for any sign of his friend. Worry and 
concern washed his metalic features.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
